SEARCH
Package Game.Entities.Commons

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
Game.Entities.Commons.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IBehaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements IEntity
Abstract base class for all living entities (Player, Enemy, etc). Contains shared logic for state, animation, collision, and weapons.
